WorkItem.Description:
Hello folks,
 
I have been trying to use AccordionItem on my WPF application project (not Silverlight) but everytime I add this control, i got "Object Reference not set to an instance of an object" error.
 
When I run it, the AccordionItem has a blue background.
 
I didn't get this sort of error when using Accordion, AccordionButton, etc..
Btw, I am using VS 2010.
 
Can anybody help?
 
Thanks,
Koko

Comments.Message:
Hi,

You can change the template and get over the blue background problem
